definition: abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan

sentences.english: But the mood in Copenhagen yesterday did not seem conducive to compromise.
sentences.chinese: 但昨日哥本哈根的气氛似乎不利于各方达成妥协。

sentences.english: This is the news yesterday from the Provincial Quality Supervision Bureau.
sentences.chinese: 这是记者昨日从省质监局获悉的。

sentences.english: I leave uncultivated today was precisely yesterday perishes tomorrow which person of the body implored.
sentences.chinese: 我旷废的本日侧是昨日殒身之人期求的暗日。

sentences.english: Can I call back yesterday's wound and make them whole?
sentences.chinese: 我能扶平昨日的创伤吗？

sentences.english: The fighting at Langfang continued for eight hours until noon yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 昨日廊坊的激战持续了8个小时，一直到中午才结束。

sentences.english: A pair of lovers in Shichahai, yes…
sentences.chinese: 昨日，在什刹海，一对情侣在雪景中缠绵。

sentences.english: Li Jianxi of SamSung group president releases outgiving to express yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 三星集团董事长李健熙昨日发布公开声明表示。

sentences.english: Jesus Christ the same yesterday, and to day, and for ever.
sentences.chinese: 耶稣基督，昨日今日一直到永远是一样的。

sentences.english: Yesterday, the City Federation of Trade Unions held in sympathy with the Urban Management Committee of the sanitation workers activities.
sentences.chinese: 昨日，市总工会与市城管委举行慰问环卫工人活动。

sentences.english: I wasted today, was precisely yesterday perishes person of the body implored.
sentences.chinese: 我荒废的今日，正是昨日殒身之人祈求的明日。

sentences.english: Without you, today's emotions, would be the scurf of yesterday's.
sentences.chinese: 没有你，今日的心情就只是昨日的头皮屑。

sentences.english: We hxdye the pleasure to acknowledge your fxdyour of yesterday advising 25 cases for Shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 您昨日告知向上海发出25箱的信函我们已敬悉。

sentences.english: I remember yesterday , the rain fell to the earth.
sentences.chinese: 我记得昨日，雨水落向大地。

sentences.english: Companies need to learn how to unlearn , to slough off yesterdays wisdom.
sentences.chinese: 公司要学会怎样放弃，要勇于抛弃昨日的成就。

sentences.english: Miners knocking back middies in Port Hedland yesterday had reason to cheer.
sentences.chinese: 昨日在黑德兰港痛饮的矿工们有理由欢呼。

sentences.english: The today that I have wasted, is the tomorrow that yesterday's dead so desperately wish for.
sentences.chinese: 我旷废的今日，恰是昨日殒身之人期求的明日。

definition: near in time/in the near future/very soon/recent
